name: Still Life, by Felix Diaz de Escauriaza

metadata.name: Summer wine
metadata.description:
The Spanish summer wine, or tinto de verano, is the perfect cocktail to enjoy on a warm summer day. 

This illustration was inspired by a photograph taken by myself: I liked the contrast of its color shades and the textures present in the cocktail glass, which prompted me to do my first still life study.

JPG file / 3000x4231
